fields.label: Site Meta Description
fields.message: These fields define information used in meta tags and links to and from other Priorclave sites

fields.label: Website Language
fields.name: site_
fields.instructions: Please select the language to use for meta information in the <html> tag.

fields.label: Show Language in Navigation?
fields.name: site_language_show
fields.instructions: If selected, the abbreviation for the language will show in the top navigation of internal pages.

fields.label: Website Country
fields.name: site_
fields.instructions: Please select the country this site represents

fields.label: Site Settings Description
fields.message: These fields define information used in various portions of the website and define basic contact information

fields.label: Company Name
fields.name: site_contact_name
fields.instructions: The name of the company, for contact purposes

fields.label: Contact Address
fields.name: site_contact_address
fields.instructions: The mailing address of the company, for contact purposes
fields.default_value:
1234 Main St.
West Somewhere Business Park
London
28SE AB0
UK

fields.label: Contact Phone Number
fields.name: site_contact_phone
fields.instructions: The phone number of the company, for contact purposes

fields.label: Contact Fax Number
fields.name: site_contact_fax
fields.instructions: The fax number of the company, for contact purposes

fields.label: Logo
fields.name: site_logo
fields.instructions: The logo to be used to represent the company throughout the website

fields.label: Contact Page
fields.name: site_contactPage
fields.instructions: The page to use for contact links throughout the site

fields.label: Operation Days & Times
fields.name: site_operation_times
fields.instructions: Typical days and hours of operation, in 24-hour format and adjusted for GMT. Add a row for each block of days or times necessary.

sub_fields.label: Time Block
sub_fields.name: time
sub_fields.instructions: Days and hours of either being open or closed.

fields.label: Menu Settings Description
fields.message: These settings define the content of the primary navigation menu

fields.label: Menu Label
fields.name: menu_autoclaves_label
fields.instructions: The label for this menu

fields.label: Grid Items
fields.name: menu_autoclaves_grid
fields.instructions: The items to include in a grid for this menu

sub_fields.label: Linked Page
sub_fields.name: page
sub_fields.instructions: The linked page for this block

sub_fields.name: label
sub_fields.instructions: The label for this block

fields.label: List Heading
fields.name: menu_autoclaves_listHeading
fields.instructions: The text to use for the header of the menu's list

fields.instructions: The items to include in a list for this menu

sub_fields.name: label

fields.instructions: The page to link this menu's footer button to

fields.label: Hero Area Defaults
fields.instructions: This section defines defaults for the header area of content pages

fields.label: Hero Area Defaults Description
fields.message: These fields define fallbacks for the general hero area on content pages throughout the site

fields.label: Hero Background Image
fields.name: default_hero_backgroundImage
fields.instructions: The default background image to use for hero areas, when one is not set.

fields.label: Hero Image
fields.name: default_hero_image
fields.instructions: The default image to use in foreground of hero areas, when one is not set.

fields.label: Newsletter Widget Settings
fields.instructions: Settings for the newsletter signup widget in sidebars on the site

fields.label: Newsletter Widget Description
fields.message: These settings define the content of the newsletter signup widget in sidebars on the site

fields.label: Headline
fields.name: widget_newsletter_headline
fields.instructions: Header text for the widget

fields.label: Gravity Forms ID
fields.name: widget_newsletter_form
fields.instructions: The ID of the form to use for this sidebar

fields.label: Featured Pages Widget Settings
fields.instructions: Pages to feature in the sidebar

fields.label: Widget Settings Description
fields.message: These settings define the content of the featured pages widget in sidebars on the site

fields.label: Featured Pages
fields.name: widget_featured_pages
fields.instructions: Pages to feature in the sidebar

sub_fields.label: Linked page
sub_fields.name: page
sub_fields.instructions: The page to link to

sub_fields.label: Link Label
sub_fields.name: label
sub_fields.instructions: The label to use for this link

sub_fields.label: Description
sub_fields.name: description
sub_fields.instructions: Short description of the linked page
sub_fields.default_value: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

fields.label: Related Information Block Settings
fields.instructions: This section sets defaults for the related information block at the bottom of some content pages.

fields.label: Block Settings Description
fields.message: These settings define default and fallback content for the related information block at the base of many content pages

fields.label: Related Info Headline
fields.name: default_related_headline
fields.instructions: Header text for the related product/page info section

fields.label: Related Info Content
fields.name: default_related_content
fields.instructions: Body copy for the related content section on general content pages
fields.default_value:
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit, sed diam nonummy nibh euismod tincidunt ut laoreet dolore magna aliquam erat volutpat. Ut wisi enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exerci tation ullamcorper suscipit lobortis nisl ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

fields.label: Related Info Image
fields.name: default_related_image
fields.instructions: The image to use for related information content section

fields.label: Related Info Button Label
fields.name: default_related_label
fields.instructions: The button label for related info blocks

fields.label: Related Info Linked Page
fields.name: default_related_page
fields.instructions: The linked page for related info blocks

fields.label: Content Settings Description
fields.message: These define values used in the footer for all pages throughout the site

fields.label: Newsletter Signup Headline
fields.name: footer_newsletter_headline
fields.instructions: Call to action text for the section
fields.default_value: Stay connected by joining our mailing list

fields.label: Newsletter Form ID
fields.name: footer_newsletter_form
fields.instructions: The ID of the Gravity Form to use in the footer

fields.label: Quicklinks
fields.name: footer_quicklinks
fields.instructions: Links to use in the footer

sub_fields.label: Label
sub_fields.name: label
sub_fields.instructions: Text to use as a label for the link

sub_fields.label: Internal Link?
sub_fields.name: linkType
sub_fields.instructions: Specify whether this link is linked to an internal page or an outside URL. If linking to another Priorclave WordPress install, please select "No".

sub_fields.label: Page
sub_fields.name: page
sub_fields.instructions: The page this link is associated with

sub_fields.label: URL
sub_fields.name: url
sub_fields.instructions: The URL this link is associated with

fields.label: Social Media Pages
fields.name: footer_networks
fields.instructions: Social media pages for the company

sub_fields.label: Network Name
sub_fields.name: network
sub_fields.instructions: The name of the network to connect to

sub_fields.label: Page URL
sub_fields.name: url
sub_fields.instructions: The URL of the page to connect to

fields.label: Credibility Badges
fields.name: footer_badges
fields.instructions: Badges to include in the footer of the site

fields.label: Footer Links
fields.name: footer_links
fields.instructions: Links to the sitemap, terms of service, etc.

sub_fields.label: Link Label
sub_fields.name: label
sub_fields.instructions: The label text for this link

sub_fields.label: Link URL
sub_fields.name: url
sub_fields.instructions: The URL associated with this link
